Hayatınızda oynayabileceğiniz en ama en kötü oyun türü. Sekmesinin imkansız olduğu bir silah modeli bile dağlara kadar sekebiliyor. Özellikle DeathMatch sunucusunda oynuyorsanız ve her adam vurduğunuzda silahını değişiyorsa, oyun daha berbat bir hale geliyor. Komiktir ki, siz adamları vurup başka bir silaha geçerken düşündüğünüz şey sadece silahınızın daha iyi olabilme ihtimali. Ancak bu oyunda bu böyle değil, silahınız geliştikçe(!) daha berbat bir oyun deneyimi yaşamaya başlıyorsunuz. Siz karşınızdaki iki düşmandan birisini vuruyorken silahını değişiyor ve ikincisini vuramadan silahın değiştiği esnada ölüveriyorsunuz. Yine komiktir ki karşı takımdan birisi siz ve arkadaşınızı hızlıca vurabiliyor. Üstüne üstelik, karşı takımdakiler daha hızlı silah geliştirdiklerinde RPG veya Grenade alabiliyorlar ve sizin Spawn noktanızı bombalıyorlar siz doğar doğmaz ölüyorsunuz. Daha kafanızı kapıdan çıkarmadan ölüyorsunuz. (Yani şair burada spawn noktasında doğduğunuz an itibariyle sadece 5 "salise" spawn korumasına sahip olduğunuzu anlatıyor.) 

Bu oyunu oynamanızı asla önermem. Valve Pack alırken bu oyunda gelmişti. Source motoru ile çalıştığı için oyunun güzel olabileceğini düşündüm.(Kan efektleri, vurulma, silah sesleri vb) ancak oyun o kadar kötü ve o kadar iğrenç aynı zamanda bir o kadar başarısız ve berbat ki siz bu oyunun berbatlığı ve diğer saydıklarımdan dolayı Source motorunun güzelliğini tadamıyorsunuz. 
Önermem!

Great game that really reminds me of my time in the war, but there is one thing you need to know...

I’ve lived through a lot in my life. I was just a boy when the National Socialist Party first rose to power in Germany, and I was only 17 when I got drafted to fight against the Reich on the beaches of Northern France. Such horrors I witnessed those terrible years, I shall never forget – it was a period of my life that cost me not only one of my legs, but my peace, my sanity and my very soul. But I’d do it all again in a heartbeat if it meant I could bring an end to the depraved Private Little, who fought alongside us. Most men in my battalion were drafted into the war, like I was. Young, terrified boys we were – too innocent to comprehend the unspeakable terrors of what was to come. Not Little though. The fucking rat signed himself up gladly, not for any noble duty to his country, no, but instead for the chance to kill freely, to crush the life out of anyone who stood before him. While our eager eyes were filled with fear and naïvity, his were empty and porcelain, blind to compassion and showing nothing but bloodlust. We had just learned to fear battle back then, but we were foolish not to already fear the fucking scourge that was Private Little.

As the war dragged on, our spirits fell. I lost many good friends in Europe…Watts, Lewis, Rains…All good men who deserved so much better than what fate dealt them. We became jaded in war, our spirits slowly tarnished and faded, like the slow decay of the heart from a dead tree. We were weak. All except Little. With every passing day, the deplorable fucking rodent grew more manic, laughing and hooting with glee as he added more and more notches to his rifle. It was truly a chilling sight to see Little in action – the shitbag rat was no larger than the clips of his own M1 Garande, yet in the heat of battle the cunt rodent wielded it with ease. He slaughtered hundreds, if not thousands, during the short time we were deployed together, earning himself the nickname of ‘Der Weiße Albtraum’ among the enemy lines. His prowess and bloodlust in battle was legendary, but more chilling was his attitude towards us, and the war itself. He revelled in slaughtering the Germans, but seemed almost captivated by their fascist ideology. “I’ve seen him hailing at night” Lewis whispered to me one day, as we both watched the hairy little fuckrag playing five-finger fillet with a sewing needle. “It’s almost as if he wants to fight for the krauts instead”. I agreed with him at the time, but today I know better. It doesn’t matter which side the little fucking cheddar-stain fights on, for he fights not for any ideology. He wishes only to kill. To maim. To murder.

It was on my last day of deployment when that murderous fucking cunt of a rodent decided to show us his true colours. As the rest of our battalion pushed forward to beat back the enemy, some of my closest comrades and I were forced into a dugout by some enemy fire. It was here that the bloodthirsty fucking bastard turned his gun on us, a triumphant gleam in his beady little eyes that I’ll never forget. Watts took a shot to the kidney, crying out for his mother as he bled out onto the dirt. The fucking traitorous rat cunt then unloaded an entire clip into Rains, before drawing his pistol and shooting me once through the ribs and thrice in the thigh. I still remember his pure evil fucking asshole face gloating above us as my vision went black, his little red eyes burning into my vision forever as I saw him toss a grenade into our dugout. I was the only one who survived.

Now I am old, my body weakened and my mind feeble. I know I will die soon. But that fucking white furry devil still looks just as young as he did during the war. Every time I see him on TV, I fucking shake with rage and regret. I don’t know what kind of ungodly creature he is, but he is no normal rodent. We should have killed him. I should have shot him in his sleep when I had the chance. He has to die. After all the deaths I caused in the war, I know I’ll end up in hell. But I hope I don’t see Little there. He deserves so much worse than hell. He deserves all the pain he has inflicted. I want to crush the life out of him myself – to flay his little hide raw and fling him against the wall by his stupid fucking tail. Fuck you, Stuart Little.

[h1] Day of Defeat: Source[/h1]

[b]Ele é FPS baseado nas operações europeias da Segunda Guerra Mundial.[/b]

[b]Ele tenta mostrar a realidade, por exemplo, se você segurar a granada muito tempo ela explode ou os tiros são baseados na vida real, não basta só atirar, tem que mirar de forma correta para ter a precisão boa.[/b]

[b]Caso você esteja com um rifle de precisão, você precisara controlar sua respiração para conseguir acerta o inimigo.[/b] 

[b]De qualquer forma, todas armas você devera calcular corretamente sua mira.[/b]

[b]Os gráficos são bem interessantes, tem uma pegada Half life 2 nos gráficos, mas a construção dos prédios e texturas tem algumas diferenças.[/b]

[b]Para quem tem interesse em jogos da Segunda Guerra Mundial, ele é um prato cheio.[/b]

[b]Bem tranquilo de jogar, com 4 GB já roda muito bem em qualquer Pc.[/b]

[b]Consegui participar de vários mapas BRS, então acredito que você consiga se divertir tranquilamente.[/b]

[h1] The unsung hero of Valve's titles: Day of Defeat (Source) [/h1]
This great game has received little attention but has a wonderful community, constantly making and creating for this old title. Released in 2010, it predates GO and has the action similar to CS:S. Personally, I think this is a game everybody should try out.

Старое, но не потерявшее своей актуальности.

Игра предлагает нам несколько режимов, давно ставших классикой для игр подобного жанра, а именно: Захват и удержание точек, уничтожение объектов и.. всё. Ну, собственно говоря, а чего вы ожидали от игры 2005 года? Есть сервера, создаваемые игроками, ну а тут уже разнообразие геймплея может вас удивить. Однако, ещё одной составляющей игры является система классов, каждый из которых имеет свою ключевую роль на поле боя: Одни предназначены для ближего боя, другие наиболее эффективны на дальних дистанциях. И у каждого имеется своя особенность, будь то прикрытие соратников дымовой завесой или же крайне высокая скорострельность, позволяющая угощать враже свинцом просто со скоростью школьника, летящего в пятницу с последнего урока к своему компьютеру. Словом, вы найдёте чем заняться на поле боя. От своего оригинала отличается более приятной графикой (оно и ясно, сурс сделал своё дело), системой классов и другими мелкими приятностями. Касательно онлайна: Здесь точно сказать не могу, ибо мне чаще встречались суровые дядьки, нежели чем представители нашего поколения. Особо это не мешает, даже забавляет немного. 

Итог: Что тут сказать? Классика, да и только. Имеется цель игры, имеются классы для достижения соотвутствующей цели, имеются также и враги, которых надо убивать. С графикой всё терпимо, разве только вы не капризный графоман. Карты порой поражают своими размерами, что тоже невольно вызывает улыбку. 

Погружение в военную атмосферу вам обеспечено. Коли денег найдёте - берите, но я бы советовал покупать игру по скидке, ибо время также не щадит сиё творение (а именно - её онлайн) и поэтому лучше бы не рисковать.

Day of Defeat source est l'exemple parfait de la conception de la "réalité" des horreurs de la guerres mondiales. 

Le problème étant: Day of Defeat source est bien limité sur la question de la conception du développement de la physique, c'est a dire que, les personnages sont très lents, et ne peuvent courrir quelques secondes... 
(Un soldat ça a de l'endurance.)

Les armes sont extrêmement limités (même plus que son prédécesseur!) 

Vous avez le choix d'être du côté de la wermatcht, ou bien de l'armée américaine.  

Je trouve sincèrement que les décors se trouvent restreints, mais en fin de compte, les "américains et les allemands" pour faire simple ne se sont hypothétiquement pas battus sur toute la terre! 

Encore une fois, j'aurais voulu qu'il y ait le workshop, imaginez votre guerre personnalisé!

J'aime beaucoup ce jeu car moi même je suis fan d'histoire^^  

Les tranchées, les ruines, sont les exemples des décors de VALVe.

Il faut être un stratège de guerre, autrement vous vous faites pris de l'ennemi! Et vous changerez le cours de l'histoire! 

Malheureusement ce jeu est complètement abandonné par ce qu'il est trop vieux, comme l'histoire qu'il souhaite d'écrire et montrer a travers ces conditions horribles (Avec le peu de moyens qui vont). 

Je reste fan de ce jeu tout de même!
Equilibré, dynamique, avec une bonne communauté.
